# Social auth google api

This module provide a endpoint to login to drupal by google's id_token

### Endpoint
#### Url:
`/user/login/google?_format=json` [POST]
#### Post body
```
{
    "id_token":"testbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsImtpZCI6ImRlZThkM2RhZmJmMzEyNjJhYjkzNDdkNjIwMzgzMjE3YWZkOTZjYTMiLCJ0eXAiOiJKV1QifQ..kkeQz3JiPjpX5PQuXWnDQ2qNJ7U2rXkTuLDn1MGgW_du6qKkavxFpNid67evAKw5df9DtbxBpQvCtn-PKj99bFfXE_6vva1-ZSolhsEqrAbZ1wP7mqB8SQjm_TbUBo_dqW_vjPUTJ7jR0elqO9yi5S4pvZrWUkTaHPzkf5t_Cv_9Kz_qHyHWAlnZWvfLfPEn6dq-ExUcAoogkf5G0gZjaHG9H6sxw_kyPaGGNpvH20M85z3gd56HyNvBjySwdOqX3Ykzm6AZi8YxY3VMDZvCPJPVah3Ly-3M0GGFp-fFrLXDsBk52hyvRRnvXOw6nciQ__yTbCoDzS_Ob85lHMtest"
}
```
